description: Fleetwood make it successive wins with a convincing 4-1 victory over Accrington.
title: Accrington Stanley 1-4 Fleetwood Town
title_page: Accrington Stanley 1-4 Fleetwood Town - BBC Sport
maintext:
Accrington Stanley have won two of their last three home league games against Fleetwood Town, though did lose this exact fixture 5-2 the last time it was played in April 2023.
Fleetwood Town are unbeaten across their last three league games against Accrington Stanley (W2 D1), with the reverse fixture finishing 1-1 back in December.
Accrington Stanley have won each of their last three midweek (Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday) league games, only ever winning four in a row once before in the Football League (from Feb-Apr 2018).
